This repo contains the code and data to reproduce all results in the 2020 **Biogeochemistry** publication: *Effects of Moisture and Physical Disturbance on Pore-Scale Oxygen Content and Anaerobic Metabolisms in Upland Soils*

`TempeCell_MasterSpreadsheet.xlsx` contains all of the data used in analyses. Please contact the corresponding author(s) for access to raw data and code used to compile raw data.
